reviewText: There was no instruction or visual on how to handle a dog who doesn't like to be on the grooming table. There was no visual or instruction on the belly area at all and minimal on the face area. We know how to wash and dry the dogs!! The dogs shown where very calm not like the typical dog. DVD appeared very dated. Not at all what I was expected for the price.
One of the better instructional videos I have viewed from Amazon. Very informative and worth the money I spent to purchase it.
